attributes.action: Make Special Needs (SEN) funding & spending reporting statutory for all schools
attributes.additional_details:
Every child adds at least £2k to a schools budget each year.
SEN children add another £6k.
Children with EHCP's add thousands more in top up funding.
Pupils with complex needs can inject £20k plus into a schools yearly budget. Yet NO reporting is required!
Pupil premium & sports grants generate between £300 -£2.5k per entitled pupil. It's statutory all schools publish full reports on every penny received & spent.
Make it the same for the funding received for SPECIAL NEEDS PUPILS!
attributes.background:
Schools should be held accountable for what SEN funding is spent on. Lets make sure SEN funding is spent on improving outcomes for SEN children! Nothing else!
Children with special needs & disabilities and their families are lacking support, up & down the country! Please HELP!
